title: Is it healthier to be dirty or hygienic? Why? - Quora

response.answer_text: Define "too hygenic."  I get plenty of exposure to bacteria simply moving through my normal life.  Dogs, dirt, doorknobs, handshakes, surfaces, telephones, you name it.  Exposure everywhere. I don't need to go out of my way to be any "dirtier" than normal. I am extra careful when I am around germs that I am not normally exposed to, such as at the Detroit Airport.
